bioconda.name: bioconductor-mpfe
bioconda.summary: Estimation of the amplicon methylation pattern distribution from bisulphite sequencing data

biotools.summary: Estimate distribution of methylation patterns from a table of counts from a bisulphite sequencing experiment given a non-conversion rate and read error rate.

bioschemas.name: MPFE
bioschemas.summary: Estimate distribution of methylation patterns from a table of counts from a bisulphite sequencing experiment given a non-conversion rate and read error rate.
